content.heading: HTML Favicon
paragraphs: A favicon is a small image displayed next to the page title in the browser tab.

content.heading: How To Add a Favicon in HTML
paragraphs: You can use any image as your favicon. Simple images with high contrast work best.
To add a favicon to your website, save your favicon image in the root directory of your web server, or in an 'images' folder. A common name for a favicon image is 'favicon.ico'.
